column2: This character is a mutant, but the effects are still largely cosmetic.
This character is a mutant, and their body has undergone radical changes.
This character is a mutant, and could well be on the way to becoming a pitiable Chaos Spawn.
A set of spines has burst forth from beneath this character's skin.
This character's face is crowned by a set of crests.
This character has a pair of horns sprouting from their head.
This character has a set of scales growing over their skin.
This character has a third eye on their forehead.
This character's tongue has grown unnaturally long and sharp.
This character has a second monstrous head coming out on the side of their neck.
This character's face has turned into a twisted and feathered beak.
This character's teeth have turned into a cruel set of fangs.
This character's skin has been covered with blinking eyes.
This character has developed a huge and unsettling pair of eyes.

Strange, painful boils erupt in your armpits and other tender locations.
When youre not looking, your bones sneak out of your body to take up a new life as a Undead, leaving you as a sack of quivering flesh.
Your neck swells fearsomely. Its warm to the touch. You can cough up a wad of liquid flame and spit it at your enemies.

Small creatures burrow into your skin and die. Their carcasses glow in a hideous pattern of single-colored spots.

Small creatures burrow into your skin and die. Their carcasses glow in a hideous pattern of underside or front of the body in one color, with the back in a contrasting shade
Much to your dismay, tongues of fire erupt from your body, turning you into a pillar of living flame.

Your hands twist and warp, transforming your fingers into hideous claws

A cloud of vile horseflies find in you the perfect friend and hover about you, crawling in your nose and mouth to nuzzle in the moisture of your body. When youre threatened, they grow angry and swarm about your head.
Your feet rapidly transform into hideous malformed stubs that harden into cloven hooves.
Your stomach houses a particularly toxic soup of corrosive fluid, much like that of a Trolls.
You are overwhelmed by a crippling fear of everything, making you a shuddering mess.
You develop a ring of ears around your head.
You develop a ring of fingers around your head.
You develop a ring of noses around your head.
You develop a ring of tongues around your head.
You develop a ring of eyes around your head.
You develop a ring of toes around your head.
You develop a ring of thumbs around your head.
You develop a ring of boils around your head.
You develop a ring of tiny arms around your head.
You develop a ring of tentacles around your head.
Your flesh, blood, bones, and sinew transform into a single body of living crystal. Though this new form is tough, its very fragile.

Your face warps into an unrecognisable mass of writhing tissue. After a few moments, it restores itself to almost its former state. Unfortunately, one of your eyes saw the churning flesh as its opportunity to escape, promptly grew wings, and flew away. Now, you have but one eye in the centre of your face, just above your nose.
Your skin leaks a foul, stinking, yellow fluid. You leave a trail of the stuff wherever you go.
: Your arms are ropey and elastic.
Raw electricity sparks from your skin.
Your head expands, growing three times its normal size.
: One of your eyes turns black with pure, concentrated evil.
: You gain an extra set of knees or elbows or both.
A number of extra digits appear on your hands or feet.

What begins as a small scratch on your face eventually widens into an extra drooling maw. It can eat, but it doesnt nourish you since the material it ingests goes somewhere other than your gullet. You can speak with this mouth as well.

One of your eyes extends from the socket on a stalk.
Both of your eyes extend from the socket on a stalk.
You develop a crippling fear of blood.

What begins as a strange rash that covers your entire body, soon worsens until feathers sprout from your bumpy flesh. Worse, the skin between your arms and sides hangs loose, forming a membrane, though for what purpose, no one knows.

While you were sleeping, your nose, eyes, and mouth left, followed soon after by all your facial hair. Any moles, warts, and scars felt lonely, so they left, too. When you awake, you discover you are now featureless. Though you lose your eyes, nose, and mouth, your senses are not impaired in any way, and you no longer need to take in food or drink to survive, though the pangs of hunger are forever-after a constant scourge.
When confronted with the awful, your mind snaps, and you suffer terrible, mental seizures.
The flesh of your face sloughs away leaving a naked skull. Moments later, the bone erupts in hellish flames.
Your body produces a terrible odour, smelling of dirty feet, rancid ham, and vomit.
Your bloodshot eyes bulge from their sockets, causing you to resemble a frog, more or less.
You grow a thin coat of fur, equivalent to a shorthaired cat.
A thick layer of fat forms under your skin. It may be uniform or it may cause unsightly and strange bulges.
A thick layer of fat forms under your skin. It may be uniform or it may cause unsightly and strange bulges.

You grow much larger. It is an unpleasant experience.
You grow much larger. It is an unpleasant experience.
You grow much larger. It is an unpleasant experience.
A strange bony growth breaks through the skin of your head, forming a new and embarrassing Head Crest.

Your body sucks its head into itself. After a few disorientating moments, your face pushes out through your chest. Though your features are unchanged, you have a hard time looking around since you lack a neck.
Your appearance changes into something abominable, something so terrifying that to look upon your visage inspires madness, even in yourself!

Each leg develops a brief but strange sentience, engaging in a contest of wills. The victor drains away all the nourishment from the other, causing its hated rival to wither and die, while it grows strong and powerful. Once the other leg dies, your remaining leg is your sole means of propulsion.
Horns grow out from your forehead.
Horns grow out from your forehead.
Horns grow out from your forehead.
Maggots infest your body, hiding in the crevices of your brain, splashing in the fluids of your stomach, and rattling in your lungs.

You descend into a primitive form, becoming something akin to an Orc, sort of. You walk with a stooped gait. Your arms lengthen, causing your hands to drag on the ground behind you. A bone ridge forms over your eyes and your forehead slopes back.
One of your eyes turns completely white. You possess now a hypnotic gaze.

: A powerful magic conceals all evidence of your mutations. You retain any penalties or benefits from the mutations, but so long as you remain out of combat, you are indistinguishable from any other of your former race. When engaged in a duel or battle, your opponent automatically sees you for what you are.
Jealous of your skin, your guts conspire to break free from your body. In a long and painful process, your body turns itself inside out so that you wear your organs on the outside.

A horrid cyst grows inside of you. Unlike Chaos Organs, this growth is intelligent. The cyst has its own motives and goals, and it tries to take control of you from time to time. Should you be slain, the Intelligent Cyst explodes from your body, sprouts limbs and waddles around as a new Chaos Spawn.

A horrid cyst grows inside of you. Unlike Chaos Organs, this growth is intelligent. The cyst has its own motives and goals, and it tries to take control of you from time to time. Should you be slain, the Intelligent Cyst explodes from your body, sprouts limbs and waddles around as a new Chaos Spawn.

Should you be slain, the Intelligent Cyst explodes from your body, sprouts limbs and waddles around as a new Chaos Spawn.
: Your body is very nearly transparent, and, at times, you seem to be smoky and insubstantial.
Small metallic growths break through your skin, forming a hard shell of metal scales.

Your skin thickens, becoming hard and leathery.

Much to your surprise, you can now hover above the ground at will.

In spurts, your legs extend far from your body as if they were trying to escape. After a few moments they stop growing but are not long and spindly. At first walking was a chore, but youve grown accustomed to them and can now take large strides.
As your neck extends in a curious way, the tendons and veins under the skin bulge, becoming ropey. While this does improve your perspective on things, your long neck is an inviting target.
Your nose grows such that it looks like a long warty, carrot.
Sharp spines grow out of your flesh, just like a porcupine.
You have long believed, in the secret places in your brain, that you were invulnerable, but your inability to be affected by spells clinches it.
: Somehow, youve gotten it in your head that magic doesnt work so well against you.
You grow a huge mane of hair, much like youd find on a horse or lion.
You have temper problems, which are exacerbated by the fact that you perceive anyone you henceforth meet as an enemy.

Life becomes a bit strange when your facial features (except your mouth) atrophy and fall off your face after a few painful and terrifying moments. Once the last vestige of your face rots away, a horrid little body sprouts out of your forehead. Its perfect in almost every detail, having two arms, a head, and a face (a twisted mockery of what you just left on the ground). The manikin does all the talking for you, leaving you to sustain it by eating as often and as much as you can.
Small Daemonic imps come from nowhere and rip chunks of your flesh from your body and replace them with mechanical ones. The replacement parts are a mechanized copy of your old biological body.
A scaly fishlike tail replaces your legs (or rear legs). In addition, you also gain gills as well as lungs, allowing you to breathe underwater.
Your body transforms into an incredible fusion of gold, steel, or silver
Your skin assumes a metallic sheen.
Your skin darkens until it becomes completely and unremittingly black, seeming to absorb light. Your eyes turn milk white, losing your pupils and irises.
Your brain is replaced by a block of Warpstone, disallowing any coherent thought or independent action on your part.
Your brain shrinks to one quarter of its normal size and weight.
A number of new arms sprout from your sides.
One or more heads grow from your shoulders.
You are legion. As a full action, you can separate yourself into several smaller duplicates.
One of your body parts becomes huge and overgrown.
Your tongue transforms into a long, sinuous, sharp monstrosity.
Your head reduces to a fraction of its normal size. As a result, your brain shrinks.
Your right hand painfully splits down the centre and transforms into something like a crab claw.
Your left hand painfully splits down the centre and transforms into something like a crab claw.
In a failed effort to escape your skull, the brain pushes against the skull until your head rises up to a sharp point.
Your incisors sharpen and become hollow. Strange, pulsing glands filled with poison grow under the flesh of the roof of your mouth.
Weird, discoloured bumps spread all over your body. While they do not hurt, they have a tendency to pop and leak a yellow discharge.
Ropes of new muscle grow in your legs, causing them to swell and bulge in unseemly ways. You gain the ability to make incredible leaps.
A long, prehensile tail grows from the base of your spine. You can use this tail as a third arm, enabling you to carry things, wield weapons and so on.
A long, prehensile tail grows from the base of your spine. You can use this tail as a third arm, enabling you to carry things, wield weapons and so on.

Your skeleton shrivels by one quarter of its original size, leaving the excess meat to hang from your reduced bones.
Two of your legs turn into arms.
You glow with a strange, purple light.

You are infused with unholy constitution and vitality.

What begins as a number of painful sores swiftly spreadsand purples your flesh. In a matter of minutes, the wounds suppurate and rot, issuing the stink of death. Every now and then, rancid meat sloughs from your body, exposing newly rotting areas beneath. The soft, wet flesh draws swarms of flies.

A mesh of fine scales sprouts all over your body.
A sinister-looking tail sprouts from your back. It is covered in black, brown, and orange plates, and ends with a hooked stinger.
The Ruinous Powers test your loyalty by removing your hearing and the organs that govern it.
The Ruinous Powers test your loyalty by removing your smell and the organs that govern it.
The Ruinous Powers test your loyalty by removing your taste and the organs that govern it.
in complications after having [GetHersHis] tongue removed.
The Ruinous Powers test your loyalty by removing your touch and the organs that govern it.
Your skin and muscle rebel and tear free from your frame. After an awkward moment, the flesh runs away in a random direction. You are now a bloody skeleton containing a sack of wet organs.
The flesh from your face (or faces) liquefies and slides away, leaving behind a bare white skull.
Your nose twists and transforms into a piggish snout. Wet and snuffling, it has a keen sense of smell.
: You are surprised to discover you have somehow grown a thick reptilian tail that ends in a knobbly spiked ball.
You grow special glands in your mouth that produce sticky globules of flesh-eating acid.
Small puffballs grow on your skin. Whenever you move, small plumes of dust burst from the growths. If you are hit in melee combat, your body produces a cloud of choking spores.
You develop a strange walk. This may be because of odd leg movements, gyrations, or a need to spin with every other step, but it seems bizarre, if not a bit silly.
Small, quivering suckers appear all over your body.
You gain the ability to move things with your mind.
Your mind is open to the thoughts of others.
The boundaries between realities are thin for you, and you can cross distances with a thought.
You are only loosely in this worlds time stream.
One of your arms withers away, replaced by a horrible tentacle covered in fine suckers.
Your fingers wither away only to be replaced by horrible tentacles.
A dense fur grows all over your body.
Small, sharp thorns break through your flesh.
Your body undergoes a horrid transformation, turning into a vile, slug-like being.
When confronted with a tough situation, you slip into a weird trance.
Your skin becomes transparent, revealing your bones and the organs underneath.
A long prehensile trunk grows from your face.
A long prehensile trunk grows from your face.
A long prehensile trunk grows from your face.
A long prehensile trunk grows from your face.
A long prehensile trunk grows from your face.

A long prehensile trunk grows from your face.
A long prehensile trunk grows from your face.
A tumour of unspeakable size grows somewhere on your body in a matter of just days.
You suffer from awful stomach distress, which manifests whenever you are threatened.

Why choose from all the different creepy crawly things to eat in the Old World when you could just have one! Thanks to a moment of clarity inspired by your foul masters, you now take sustenance from one thing, and one thing only
Your arms and legs switch places.
You become two separate identities fused into one mass of flesh and bone.
You are repellent. You unconsciously act in ways that repels others, doing exactly the right thing to make them hate you.
: You are dangerously unstable. Your body twists further as you enter a frenzy, gaining additional mutations for its duration.
Every inch of your body is covered in large, quivering warts.
You gain a deeper understanding of killing.
You grow a pair of leathery wings, which may or may not allow you powers of flight.
Ones a champion of chaos but now just a hunk of flesh, the gods have abandoned you and the mutations ave warp your form and mind.
Your mind or body has been warped by a mutation, the work of the dark gods.
By the Gods! You wake up with a terrible itch somewhere on your body, and when you turn to scratch, it feels like you poked yourself in the eye. You've grown a third eye!!!
I'll cleanse myself, no matter what!
Over the last couple of days, a part of your body has been growing strange hair... it has gotten worse, and you now have a small patch of fur somewhere on your body!
Your fellows have been telling you lately to take a bath in no uncertain terms, but no matter how much you scrub, the smell just won't go away. A foul mutation is causing you to reek!
Lately your hand has been slowly transforming, and one day, you wake to discover a huge claw where once your hand was! Curses, this is going to be hard to hide...
Oh Gods, I'll need to get the meat cleaver...

It's subtle at first, but you can't deny it any longer - your appearance is slightly turning into that of an animal, whether a cat, dog, cow, or deer... it's not a full transformation, but it's impossible to cover up any longer!
I'll need to go into hiding!
Some part of your body is undergoing serious changes - whether it's your feet turning into hoofs or a shell growing on your back, this is becoming impossible to hide!
I'll need to go into hiding!
Your body is mutating faster and faster, and you are turning into some kind of beast! Your mind is starting to crack under the pressure...
I'll need to go into hiding!
You have been struck by a terrible mutation - your body is literally falling apart and rotting, but it is no normal disease! It won't take long until you are a lump of twisted flesh!
I'll need to go into hiding!

By all the gods... you wake up one morning to hear someone screaming next to you, and turn to find that you have grown a second head which looks at you in horror and screams into your face with foetid breath.
*Turn to the head and scream back* AAHHHHH!!!
After all the mutations, you barely look like your former self. Your body is strangely misshapen and normal people will hate and fear you whenever they find you.
Your mortal body could no longer endure the effects of mutations - you've become a Chaos Spawn - mindless creature in service of the Ruinous Powers.
Mutations are a sign of Chaos, and signs of Chaos must be rooted out with fire and sword! You should probably check this court for signs of mutants while you're here...
Curses! The Witch Hunter at your court has spied on you, and discovered your mutation! This is surely the end, for you...
I will appeal to my liege!

My liege! I must confess... it is true I have been horribly mutated by Chaos, but I do not serve the Ruinous Powers, I swear it! I am an innocent victim - please do not trust the Witch Hunter's accusations!
Unclean abomination, death by fire for you!
Very well, I shall show mercy. But see a surgeon at once!
I will not slay you, but nor will I let you roam free...

You come out of hiding, but your mutations are so advanced that the first courtier who sees you screams and flees in horror shouting for the guards. Soon you are surrounded, but despite your pleas for mercy, one of them stabs you, and the others quickly follow through!
A fellow realm ruler has been killed by his own guards, after he came out of his quarters horribly mutated. It is the topic of gossip all over the realm these days. These are truly terrible times...

The Chaos Gods have twisted and stretched your body to its limit, to the point you can barely recognize yourself any more. The many mutations have turned you into a horrific display of horns, scales and unnatural appendages.
More and more mutations have reshaped your body, turning you into a monstrous being.
The Chaos Gods have undoubtedly touched you.
The voices never shut up, sometimes reality changes before you in a blink of an eye: friend turns to foe, night to day. Is there anything at all real?
Sometimes you just think all reality is part of a dream. And you are the dreamer. Those poor fools, not understanding they're just figments of your imagination...
People sometimes look at you strangely, as if they were hiding something, but they never give you a straight answer if you inquire about them.

You've long followed the gods, trusted in their blessing and kept on honouring them in your every action, yet their gaze has not touched you, you've not received their gifts and have been left, with the voices in your head tormenting and berating you. The gods cursed and left you.

You cannot stand it any more: the powers of Chaos running through your body can no longer be contained by your will. With a shrieking sound your flesh twists and rips open as you turn into a mindless abomination.
Your existence of continued torment and hate as finally come to an end: whatever is left of your body collapses, completely ripped into shreds by the stuff of Chaos.
You feel a itch on your nose, but when you raise your hand to scratch it, you find yourself grasping at a growing hard beak, quickly taking it's place over your whole face.

You awoke with a sense of choking. You gasped, searching for air, but something large and wet is blocking your mouth. It takes some time to realize it is your very tongue, overgrown and extended to unnatural proportions.
Your teeth fall one after another. In their place long and rotten fangs sprout, until you can barely speak coherently.
More and more eyes open on your face, then your neck and, after that, your whole body is covered by blinking appendages.
Something it's irritating your eyes, but the more you scratch them, the more they burn. When you finally find peace, you realize your eyes have turned into bulging reptile-like things.
